Package: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality

[Groovy] Class Checkstyle

      • org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.Checkstyle
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        Reporting, VerificationTask

        class Checkstyle
extends SourceTask

        Runs Checkstyle against some source files.

        • Properties Summary

            Properties 
            Type Name and description
            FileCollection  checkstyleClasspath
            The class path containing the Checkstyle library to be used.
            FileCollection  classpath
            The class path containing the compiled classes for the source files to be analyzed.
            File  configFile
            The Checkstyle configuration file to use.
            Map<String, Object>  configProperties
            The properties available for use in the configuration file.
            boolean  ignoreFailures
            Whether or not this task will ignore failures and continue running the build.
            boolean  showViolations
            Whether or not rule violations are to be displayed on the console.

        • Constructor Summary

            Constructors 
            Constructor and description
            Checkstyle ()

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            IsolatedAntBuilder getAntBuilder()
            Instantiator getInstantiator()
            CheckstyleReports getReports()
            The reports to be generated by this task.
            CheckstyleReports reports(Closure closure)
            Configures the reports to be generated by this task.
            void run()

        • Property Detail

          • @InputFiles FileCollection checkstyleClasspath

            The class path containing the Checkstyle library to be used.

          • @InputFiles FileCollection classpath

            The class path containing the compiled classes for the source files to be analyzed.

          • @InputFile File configFile

            The Checkstyle configuration file to use.

          • @Input @Optional Map<String, Object> configProperties

            The properties available for use in the configuration file. These are substituted into the configuration file.

          • boolean ignoreFailures

            Whether or not this task will ignore failures and continue running the build.

          • boolean showViolations

            Whether or not rule violations are to be displayed on the console.

        • Constructor Detail

          • Checkstyle()

        • Method Detail

          • @Inject IsolatedAntBuilder getAntBuilder()

          • @Inject Instantiator getInstantiator()

          • CheckstyleReports getReports()

            The reports to be generated by this task.

            Returns:
            The reports container

          • CheckstyleReports reports(Closure closure)

            Configures the reports to be generated by this task. The contained reports can be configured by name and closures. Example: 

             checkstyleTask {
   reports {
     xml {
       destination "build/codenarc.xml"
     }
   }
 }
            Parameters:
            closure - The configuration
            Returns:
            The reports container

          • @TaskAction void run()
